long_description: Designed for comfort with a shock-absorbent seat and upright pedaling position, the Raleigh Detour 4.5 Bike cruises down bike paths, through neighborhoods or into work. Aluminum frame is sturdy and designed for a blend of comfort and efficiency; flat handlebar encourages an upright riding position for great visibility. Shimano crankset and derailleurs provide easy pedaling and shifting through all 24 speeds; it's geared for hills as well as flat roads. Shimano EZ Fire trigger shifters are intuitively easy to use and deliver precise indexed shifting. ProMax alloy V-brakes facilitate smooth, responsive deceleration for easy speed management. 700c wheels are outfitted with puncture-resistant Kenda tires for excellent rolling performance on bike paths and streets. Suspension seatpost offers bump-smoothing comfort; angle-adjustable stem lets you fine-tune the handlebar to enhance the fit. Convenient platform pedals accept most casual shoes. Eyelets accept fenders and rear rack (not included). Specs on the Raleigh Detour 4.5 Bike are subject to change.
